long_description: The divide between practicality and style is often wide, but that gap has been closed with the Timbuk2 Harriet shoulder bag. A zippered expansion feature allows you to double its volume. Bottom zipper allows the bag's capacity to expand when you need to carry more than normal. Zip-close main pocket has multiple slot pockets and an internal zippered pocket. Generously sized front exterior pocket has 3 bellowed slot pockets to hold phone, I.D. or glasses, and includes a key clip; secures with rip-and-stick closures. Generously sized rear slip pocket provides a spot for quick-access items. Adjustable shoulder strap. The Timbuk2 Harriet bag features a contrast zipper color with matching contrast trim and stitching.
short_description: The divide between practicality and style is often wide, but that gap has been closed with the Timbuk2 Harriet shoulder bag. A zippered expansion feature allows you to double its volume.
